name: Village Dinerz
description:
Elaine is determined to recreate a forgotten dish she experienced in the past. Woods, whom Elaine saved before, shared with her detailed information on The Legendary 12 Course Meal.

In hopes to seek out what dish it was that Elaine experienced, she gathers various meat required to make The Legendary 12 Course Meal. The methods to obtain them are far from easy.

Will Elaine be able to face this challenge?

The story begins.

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/VillageDinerz
